title: The minimum qualifications for an architect shall be the qualifications as provided in the Architects Act, 1972 and should be registered with the Council of Architecture with valid membership
clause_text: The minimum qualifications for an architect shall be the qualifications as provided in the Architects Act, 1972 and should be registered with the Council of Architecture with valid membership. Such registered Architects shall not be required to again register their names with the Authority. However, he shall submit the registration certificate to the Authority. To carry out work related to development permission as given below and shall be entitled to submit - All plans and technical information connected with designs and plans of development permission.
